original_text: Just then, Abraham looked round and he saw a male sheep behind him. Its horns were caught in some bushes. So he went and he took hold of the sheep. Abraham killed the sheep on the altar as a burnt offering to God. In that way, he killed the sheep as a sacrifice, instead of his son.
korean_text: 아브라함이 눈을 들어 살펴본즉 한 숫양이 뒤에 있는데 뿔이 수풀에 걸려 있는지라 아브라함이 가서 그 숫양을 가져다가 아들을 대신하여 번제로 드렸더라

sentences.original_text: and he saw a male sheep behind him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 뒤에 숫양 한 마리를 보았다

sentences.original_text: Its horns were caught in some bushes
sentences.korean_translation: 그 숫양의 뿔이 덤불에 걸려 있었다

sentences.original_text: and he took hold of the sheep
Abraham killed the sheep on the altar
as a burnt offering to God
In that way, he killed the sheep as a sacrifice
